name: pollevbot
description: A response bot for multiple-choice polls on PollEverywhere

DAY_OF_WEEK.description: Cron string specifying weekdays to run pollevbot

HOUR.description: Cron string specifying which hours to run pollevbot

MINUTE.description: Cron string specifying what minutes to run pollevbot

LOGIN_TYPE.description: Login protocol to use (either uw or pollev)

LIFETIME.description: Time to run pollevbot before terminating (in seconds). Set to inf to run forever.
